select id, c.DEPTID, c.DEPTNAME, b.code, b.name, c.jobname, DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT(KSRQ, ' ' ,KSSJ, ':00'), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') AS KSSJ, requestid, txrcode, DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT(JSRQ, ' ' ,JSSJ, ':00'), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') AS JSSJ, WORKCODE, CLBZ, CLLX, (select TYPE_NAME from adc_attend_type where BUS_CODE=CLLX) ADC_NAME, days, txrcode, a.remark from oa_intf a, employee b, deptempl c, eadept d where a.WORKCODE=b.CODE and b.EMPID=c.EMPID and c.deptid=d.deptid
requestid = "$requestid$""
d.cascadeid like "$cascadeid$%"
a.cllx = "$cllx$"
a.clbz = "$clbz$"
b.code = "$code$"
b.name like "%$name$%"
(a.KSRQ <= '$start_date$' and a.JSRQ >= '$start_date$')
((a.KSRQ <= '$start_date$' and a.JSRQ >= '$start_date$') or (a.KSRQ <= '$end_date$' and a.JSRQ >= '$end_date$') or ('$start_date$' <= a.KSRQ and '$end_date$' >= a.JSRQ))
(a.KSRQ <= '$end_date$' and a.JSRQ >= '$end_date$')

select count(*) as count from oa_intf a, employee b, deptempl c, eadept d where a.WORKCODE=b.CODE and b.EMPID=c.EMPID and c.deptid=d.deptid
requestid = "$requestid$""
c.cascadeid like "$cascadeid$%"
a.cllx = "$cllx$"
a.clbz = "$clbz$"
b.code = "$code$"
b.name like "%$name$%"
(a.KSRQ <= '$start_date$' and a.JSRQ >= '$start_date$')
((a.KSRQ <= '$start_date$' and a.JSRQ >= '$start_date$') or (a.KSRQ <= '$end_date$' and a.JSRQ >= '$end_date$') or ('$start_date$' <= a.KSRQ and '$end_date$' >= a.JSRQ))
(a.KSRQ <= '$end_date$' and a.JSRQ >= '$end_date$')
